site_name: Four Quarters187 Rye LaneLondonSouthwarkSE15 4TP
description: Amendment of condition 291 to allow the venue to operate without the requirement for SIA, but only when operating as a predominantly seated premises with a reduced capacity below 50% of the current Fire Risk assessed capacity of 250, and offering no regulated entertainment. The condition would now read:291 - A minimum of two(2) SIA registered Door Supervisors, shall be employed at all times after 20:00hrs till the terminal hour on Friday and Saturday and on all occasions when a DJ is being used or recorded music is being played other than background music, except when operating as a predominantly seated premises with a reduced capacity below 50% of the current Fire Risk assessed capacity AND offering NO regulated entertainment.Two more permanent changes are requested - the removal of condition 371 - (That the premises licence holder will submit Promotion Event Risk Assessment - Form 696s to Southwark Police Licensing Unit in respect of all new DJ's and new events involving recorded music at the premises)the reason being that this condition is out of date.Permanently adding condition 4AJ by removing part(d) (Whenever the outside area is operating to a maximum of 8 patrons smoking on the premises frontage, the outside awning will be extended), the reason being that the awning was damaged beyond repair by wind sometime ago and will not be replaced.
